characters.name:
Lavender Crystal Pony
Amber Laurel
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Has speaking roles in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Times They Are A Changeling, voiced by Andrea Libman in both. Also appears in A Royal Problem, Uncommon Bond, The Parent Map, and The Beginning of the End - Part 1. Her cutie mark is an ornamental flowerpot. She is a character called "Lavender Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Amberlocks
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in the Crystal Empire in The Crystal Empire - Part 2 and Games Ponies Play and in Canterlot in Magical Mystery Cure. Her cutie mark is a grain of wheat.

characters.name:
Plum Crystal Pony
Amethyst Shard
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Also appears in The Times They Are A Changeling, It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, Uncommon Bond, and The Beginning of the End - Part 1. Her cutie mark is three purple wheel-shaped objects. She is a character called "Plum Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Arctic Lily
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2. She also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 5. Her cutie mark is a fleur-de-lis.

characters.name: Berry Splash
characters.description: A Crystal Pony athlete who appears in Games Ponies Play.

characters.name:
Mail Pony
Brilliant Service
characters.description: Appears in The Parent Map as a Crystal Empire mail carrier. His cutie mark is a red ribbon. He is a character called "Crystal Mailpony" in Gameloft's mobile game; his bio states, "Neither snow nor sleet nor Sombra can keep him from his appointed rounds! Well, maybe that last one can." Voiced by Andrew McNee.

characters.name: Check Mate
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2. He also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 5. His cutie mark is a crenelated tower.

characters.name: Crystal Hoof
characters.description: Disguise used by Thorax in The Times They Are A Changeling.

characters.name: Crystal Varado
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in Equestria Games, fanning Spike. Also appears in The Crystalling - Part 1, The Crystalling - Part 2, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9.

characters.name: Dandy Brush
characters.description: One of the stylist Crystal Ponies who appear in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in the season 3 poster. Her cutie mark is a brush.

characters.name: Esmeralda
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2. Her cutie mark is a fleur-de-lis.

characters.name:
Cream Crystal Pony
Fleur De Verre
characters.description: See Fleur De Verre.

characters.name:
Indigo Crystal Pony
Gallic
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Also appears in The Times They Are A Changeling, A Royal Problem, Uncommon Bond, The Parent Map, The Beginning of the End - Part 1, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. His cutie mark is a royal guard helmet. He is a character called "Indigo Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Golden Glitter
characters.description: One of the stylist Crystal Ponies who appear in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in The Times They Are A Changeling, It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, and the season 3 poster. Her cutie mark is a crown. She is named in the twenty-second wave of mystery pack toys and collector cards. The collector card states about Golden Glitter, "She throws parties for her friends."

characters.name: Golden Hooves
characters.description: A messenger Crystal Pony who appears in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in The Crystalling - Part 1, The Crystalling - Part 2, The Beginning of the End - Part 1, Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9, and the season 3 poster. She resembles Lemon Hearts in color scheme. She is named "Golden Hooves" in the twenty-second wave of mystery pack toys and collector cards. The collector card states about Golden Hooves, "She delivers good news to friends." Her cutie mark in the show is a grain of wheat and on the toy is a winged lightning bolt. Voiced by Cathy Weseluck. She was first named "Mercury" on her Enterplay collectible card game The Crystal Games expansion set card #40 U, which gives her the description "Fast on her hooves and with a detailed memory of every street corner and business around, there is no better messenger pony in the Crystal Empire than Mercury!" She is a character named "Mercury" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of her states, "This messenger pony’s speed just can’t be beat. You need a delivery? She’ll see it complete!"

characters.name:
Orange Crystal Pony
Golden Väs
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Has speaking roles in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Times They Are A Changeling. Voiced by Andrew Francis in the former, and Ian Hanlin in the latter. Also appears in It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, Uncommon Bond, The Beginning of the End - Part 1, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. His cutie mark is an ornamental vase. He is a character called "Orange Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Golden Wheat
characters.description: One of the cleaning Crystal Ponies who appear in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2. Her cutie mark is a grain of wheat. She is named on her Enterplay collectible card game The Crystal Games expansion set card #84 C, which gives her the description "Golden Wheat put just as much effort into cleaning the city before the Equestria Games as she does caring for her little animal friends throughout the Crystal Empire."

characters.name: Honeysparkle
characters.description: One of the stylist Crystal Ponies who appear in Games Ponies Play. Has a speaking role in The Times They Are A Changeling. Also appears in the season 3 poster. She resembles Sweetie Drops in color scheme. Her cutie mark is a pair of combs. She is named "Honeysparkle" in the twenty-third wave of mystery pack toys and collector cards. She was first named "Glamour Gleam" on her Enterplay collectible card game The Crystal Games expansion set card #64 U, which lists the quote "You'll feel MUCH better after you exfoliate, darling, trust me." She is a character named "Glamour Gleam" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Jade
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2. Her cutie mark is a fleur-de-lis.

characters.name: Jaded Jasper
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2. His cutie mark is a crenelated tower.

characters.name: Lilac Luster
characters.description: One of the stylist Crystal Ponies who appear in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in the season 3 poster. She resembles Daisy in color scheme. Her cutie mark is two flowers and a bow. She is named in the twenty-second wave of mystery pack toys and collector cards. The collector card states about Lilac Luster, "She loves shiny, happy friends." She was first named on her Enterplay collectible card game The Crystal Games expansion set card #66 C, which gives her the description "Lilac Luster's personal motto is that the better you take care of yourself, the better you take care of others." She is a character in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Mustache Crystal Pony
Mustafa Combe
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. Has the same body type as Trenderhoof, "Free Throw", "Natural Deduction", "Uptown Clover", and S06E17 Unnamed Earth Stallion #6 and a similar body type to "Sprig Hooffield", S07E10 Unnamed Earth Stallion #4, and Chancellor Neighsay. His cutie mark is a mustache and comb. Voiced by Russell Roberts. He is a character called "Mustache Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Neighls Bohr
characters.description: A freckled Crystal Pony who appears in Equestria Games with a speaking role. Also appears in The Crystalling - Part 1, in The Crystalling - Part 2, in The Times They Are A Changeling, in Fame and Misfortune, in Uncommon Bond, in The Beginning of the End - Part 1, in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9, and on the season 4 poster. Voiced by Ashleigh Ball.

characters.name: Periwinkle Pace
characters.description: A Crystal Pony athlete who appears in Games Ponies Play. In the book Winning Style, he appears alongside "Rapid Rush" and "Toastie" on page 8 and is set to win the race on page 9. He is named on his Enterplay collectible card game The Crystal Games expansion set card #11 C, which lists the quote "I won the Crystal Empire Jump Rope Championships before most ponies in Equestria were born! So when I tell you that you should stretch before you exercise, you better believe I know what I'm talking about."

characters.name: Purple Polish
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2 and cleaning in Games Ponies Play.

characters.name: Rapid Rush
characters.description: A Crystal Pony athlete who appears in Games Ponies Play. In the book Winning Style, she appears alongside "Toastie" and Periwinkle Pace on page 8 and is set to lose the race on page 9.

characters.name: Rooks Rampart
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in the Crystal Empire in The Crystal Empire - Part 2, Games Ponies Play, The Crystalling - Part 1, The Crystalling - Part 2, and The Times They Are A Changeling, and in Canterlot in Magical Mystery Cure. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. His cutie mark is a crenelated tower. He is named "Rooks Rampart" in the twenty-second wave of mystery pack toys and collector cards. The collector card states about Rooks Rampart, "A friendly game is his favorite thing." He was first named "Rook Ramparts" on his Enterplay collectible card game The Crystal Games expansion set card #55 C, which attributes to him and Pinkie Pie the respective quotes "Knight to queen's bishop 3." and "Go fish!"

characters.name: Rose Quartz
characters.description: One of the stylist Crystal Ponies who appear in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and the season 3 poster.

characters.name: Sand Arrow
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 1. His cutie mark is an archer's bow and arrow.

characters.name: Sapphire Rose
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2 and Games Ponies Play. Her cutie mark appears to be a grain of wheat.

characters.name:
Yellow Crystal Pony
Scarlet Heart
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Has speaking roles in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Times They Are A Changeling. She is voiced by Nicole Oliver in the former and Iris Quinn in the latter. Also appears in A Royal Problem, It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, Uncommon Bond, The Beginning of the End - Part 1, The Ending of the End - Part 2, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. Her cutie mark is three red hearts. She is a character called "Yellow Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Pin Pony
Scouts Honor
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. His cutie mark is three safety pins. Voiced by Ian Hanlin. He is a character called "Pin Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Green Crystal Pony
Silver Medal
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Also appears in The Times They Are A Changeling, It Isn't the Mane Thing About You, Uncommon Bond, The Beginning of the End - Part 1, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. His cutie mark is a trophy-like object. He is a character called "Green Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Sugar Glass
characters.description: A food stand Crystal Pony who appears in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in The Crystalling - Part 1, The Crystalling - Part 2, Uncommon Bond, and Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9, and the season 3 poster.

characters.name: Sunshine Splash
characters.description: A Crystal Pony athlete who appears in Games Ponies Play.

characters.name: Take Off
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 at the Crystal Empire train station. His cutie mark is a paper airplane.

characters.name: Toastie
characters.description: A Crystal Pony athlete who appears in Games Ponies Play. Also appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 and The Crystalling - Part 2. In the book Winning Style, she appears alongside "Rapid Rush" and Periwinkle Pace on page 8 and is set to lose the race on page 9.

characters.name: Verity Lucky
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 when Flurry Heart demonstrates her uncontrollable magic. Has a similar color scheme to Gloriosa Daisy but specified by Jim Miller to be a different character.

characters.name: Winnow Wind
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2. Also appears in a photograph in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 5. Her cutie mark is a grain of wheat.

characters.name: Zirconic
characters.description: A Crystal Pony who appears in The Crystal Empire - Part 2 and Games Ponies Play.

characters.name:
Stubborn Crystal Pony
Tough Nut
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 2 as a witness to Flurry Heart's Crystalling. Also appears in Baby Flurry Heart's Heartfelt Scrapbook episode 9. Shares her body type with Amethyst Maresbury and "Booksmart". Her cutie mark is a mule. Voiced by Andrea Libman. She is a character called "Stubborn Crystal Pony" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Violet Crystal Foal
Cherry Quartz
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 as one of Spike's fans. Also appears in Uncommon Bond. He is a character called "Violet Crystal Foal" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Pink Crystal Foal
Cloudy Spinel
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 as one of Spike's fans. Also appears in Uncommon Bond. She is a character called "Pink Crystal Foal" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name:
Chiffon Crystal Foal
Coral Shores
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 as one of Spike's fans. Also appears in Uncommon Bond and The Beginning of the End - Part 1. She is a character called "Chiffon Crystal Foal" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of her states, "A Spike superfan if there ever was one -- she just thinks that dragon is oodles of fun!"

characters.name:
White Crystal Foal
Frosty Quartz
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 2 evacuating the Crystal Empire. Also appears in It Isn't the Mane Thing About You and The Beginning of the End - Part 1. He is a character called "White Crystal Foal" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Glass Slipper
characters.description: One of two Crystal Pony fillies featured in The Crystal Empire - Part 1, only shown in Princess Celestia's projection of the Crystal Empire prior to King Sombra's rule. Also appears in Games Ponies Play, Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, The Crystalling - Part 1, and the season 3 poster in the present-day Crystal Empire. She has no cutie mark.

characters.name: Hope
characters.description: One of two Crystal Pony fillies featured in both Games Ponies Play and Twilight's Kingdom - Part 1, in the present-day Crystal Empire. Has a similar color scheme to "Titania". She has no cutie mark.

characters.name: Opal Bloom
characters.description: One of two Crystal Pony fillies featured in The Crystal Empire - Part 1, only shown in Princess Celestia's projection of the Crystal Empire prior to King Sombra's rule. Shares Apple Bloom's character design and hair bow design. Her cutie mark is a grain of wheat.

characters.name:
Aqua Crystal Foal
Rock Candy
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 as one of Spike's fans. Also appears in The Beginning of the End - Part 1. She is a character called "Aqua Crystal Foal" in Gameloft's mobile game. The game's description of her states, "This foal sure is friendly and quite quick to laugh (and is seriously jonesing for Spike's autograph)."

characters.name:
Blue Crystal Foal
Tiny Topaz
characters.description: Appears in The Crystalling - Part 1 as one of Spike's fans. He is a character called "Blue Crystal Foal" in Gameloft's mobile game.

characters.name: Sir Pony Moore
characters.description: See Sir Pony Moore.
